view.economy

Class EconomyAddOutcomeGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.economy.EconomyAddOutcomeGUI

  • public class EconomyAddOutcomeGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    GUI class relating to the Expense adding section of economy page

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane addOutcomePane
      The list view from where adding, editing and deleting can be started
      (package private) CategoryDAO categoryDAO
      CategoryDAO used for accessing the database
      (package private) EconomyController controller 
      (package private) InputCheck inputCheck
      The reference of InputCheck class used for checking user's input
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField outcomeAmount
      The reference of TextField (expense's amount) will be injected by the FXML loader
      private javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> outcomeCategoryList
      The reference of ChoiceBox (expense's categories list) will be injected by the FXML loader
      private javafx.scene.control.DatePicker outcomeDate
      The reference of DatePicker (expenses) will be injected by the FXML loader
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField outcomeDescription
      The reference of TextField (expense's description) will be injected by the FXML loader

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EconomyAddOutcomeGUI() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelAdding()
      Method that displays the view of the list of expenses in the Economy section if adding new expense is canceled
      java.lang.String getCategoryName()
      Method that gets the chosen option from outcomeCategoryList ChoiceBox and returns it
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Method that gets input from outcomeDescription TextField and returns it
      float getExpenseAmount()
      Method that gets the value from outcomeAmount TextField and returns it in float format
      java.sql.Date getExpenseDay()
      Method that gets the chosen date from outcomeDate DatePicker and returns it
      void initialize()
      Method that initializes the view - gets the expense categories from the EconomyController and displays them in the drop down list
      void saveExpense()
      Method that tells controller to save the added expense if the input can be transfered into float and displays the view of the list of expenses in the Economy section after adding new expense

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
